Reviews.Title: Get it from TOP SHELF ELECTRONICS
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I actually previously ordered the galaxy s2 from another amazon vendor but it was clearly a refurbished phone and that was not what I wanted. I was really upset not only because it was terribly refurbished, and did not come with headphones but also because it actually took 6 days to get to me. So I was phoneless for that long. However, I received it from Top shelf electronics in just 2 business days and it was new! No scratches, came with headphones, and it was just pure happiness sent to me. :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!
Reviews.Author: Gregori D. Gualdron "gregdwdk"
Reviews.Content: After more than 6 months of use, the phone is still so fast! I love it, came in box, 100% new and original. Shipping was fast.

Reviews.Title: good phone with just OK battery
Reviews.Author: SYED SHAHZAD UL HUSSAN
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful phone but its battery life is just pain and is a big hinderance to enjoy most of applications

Reviews.Title: love samsung s2
Reviews.Author: Emmanuella Kange-Iyo
Reviews.Content: Love my phone it was so easy to set up the battery was already charged so i just put in the sim and bam! i was ready to use my phone. thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: ifine
Reviews.Content: Beautiful design and easy to use..Smart features. Light and compact The cons; the small memory.Does not carry the annouced memory.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S II
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast. My granddaughter is thrilled with this phone. She loves all the aspects of the phone and will not put it down.  So far, not a problem in sight!  I would recommend Amazon and the Samsung I9100 to everyone.  Great phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung I9100 Galaxy S 2 Factory Unlocked in White Color
Reviews.Author: Merav Afek
Reviews.Content: This phone has very good value for money! it's very nice in White, light weighted considering its size and very easy and convenient to use.

Reviews.Title: good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Amos
Reviews.Content: Screen had some wear and it took some major updating, also the touchscreen will freeze from time to time - but for the price I would buy it again and recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Serious problems with the device
Reviews.Author: guido
Reviews.Content: I'm from Argentina sorry for my English and for the delay of my review. The phone do not recognize any signal, it works like a tablet. I would like to know how can I make contact with the seller or how can I solve this problem. I'm looking forward to any kind of answer or solution.

Reviews.Title: Aweful!
Reviews.Author: JulianV12
Reviews.Content: The wifi at the beginning didn't work, then it worked again. Then in less than a month the left button stoped working, later the right button stoped working also. I reallly hate this cellphone!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Teresa Chandler
Reviews.Content: I had this phone a week and did not like it. It would not take the touch a lot of times and it would not go into sleep mode, the speaker volume was very low. Was very un happy with it. But I might have got a bad phone. Was told by seller that all the samsungs s2 do that.
